Text:
Now what the fuck is this?

Each time I searched for aXXo I got brilliant movies, now I get shitty torrents for subtitles for his movies?

Come on, the real subtitles can be downloaded at:

http://divxstation.com/subtitles.asp

//Winde

Ps. Please stop posting this crap! :-)

Oh, aXXo, what has happened to you?! You've always clicked just the proper left mouse button, and now you start also righclicking? Pleeeeaaaase, don't do it to us, we suffer?

[Above is not serious, of course]

WindeGuy ? you should go to a doctor. I think you still can be cured.
